item.description:
Professional Singles Nite with Central CT Singles

Are you a Professional Single? Do you want to meet other Professional Singles?

Don’t settle for less – meet that high quality educated professional and find your perfect match!

Put on your good tie or dress and join Central CT Singles and Local Single Professions for Magic Table.

The Magic Table Lets You MEET and TALK With ALL The
Other Singles At This Event, And Then The Magic Begins

Feel the spark and chemistry of finally meeting and connecting with someone who is a great match with you – who shares common interests and backgrounds.

Unlike Speed Dating, there is no pressure, no stress, and no boredom. We show you to your table, introduce you to other singles, start the conversation – and then you take it from there!

Professional dress is required - No jeans, t-shirts, or sneakers -DRESS TO IMPRESS

Professional Singles Night with Magic Table is a great alternative to Internet dating, speed dating, singles dances, or hanging out at the bar hoping to meet the right person. With Central CT Single’s Magic Table, you are guaranteed to have a great time while you meet new people.

Space Is Limited To 60 people -30 Men and 30 Women
-So Reserve Your Spot Today!


NEXT EVENT: Thursday September 24 at 7 pm:

Shade Bar and Grill
at the DoubleTree Hotel
16 Ella Grasso Turnpike
Windsor Locks, CT 06096
860-254-9001

Next To Bradley international Airport

For Directions, Visit:
http://www.mapquest.c...

Enjoy Appetizers, Jazz and the Magic Table
For $15 Online, $ 20 At The Event

SUMMER SPECIAL – Only $10 Online or $15 At The Event

Reserve your spot today! Visit http://www.CentralCTS... or call (860) 236-3343

UPCOMING EVENTS:

Sunday Sept 13 at 6 pm Sunday Nite Dance Party at The Melody Lane Party Room at the Cherry Street Restaurant, 428 South Cherry Street, Wallingford, CT 06492 – DJ Dance Music and FREE Appetizers! SUMMER SPECIAL -Tickets are $10 at the Dance Party, 2 for $15 online at www.CentralCTSingles.com or call (860) 236-3343

Wednesday Sept 16 Unlimited Galactic Bowling 7pm to 11pm with FREE snacks and Soda
at Spare Time Bristol, 117 Farmington Road (Route 6) Bristol, CT 06010 – SUMMER SPECIAL: Tickets are $15 at the event, $10 online at www.CentralCTSingles.com or call (860) 236-3343

Sunday Sept 20 at 6 pm Sunday Nite Dance Party at The Melody Lane Party Room at the Cherry Street Restaurant, 428 South Cherry Street, Wallingford, CT 06492 – DJ Dance Music and FREE Appetizers! SUMMER SPECIAL -Tickets are $10 at the Dance Party, 2 for $15 online at www.CentralCTSingles.com or call (860) 236-3343

Thursday Sept 24 at 7pm – Professional Singles Nite with Magic Table at Shade Bar and Grill at the DoubleTree Hotel, 16 Ella Grasso Turnpike, Windsor Locks, CT 06096 (near Bradley Intl Airport) - Includes Free Appetizers - Tickets are $15 at the event or $10 online at www.CentralCTSingles.com or call (860) 236-3343
